152: We are looking for people that have a passion to serve and lead others! Working at the front desk means you are at the hub of the hotel with the most interaction with our guests. Your role is key to the overall experience the guest will have. During the overnight shift you are essentially working without supervision so your responsibility is seen as even greater as you assist in closing out the business for the day as well as check in or out those guests during non- traditional hours. If you enjoy working semi-independently from others and have a winning personality and high sense of responsibility - this role is perfect for you! As a full-time employee, you will receive the following: Competitive Pay Paid Time Off - Holiday, Vacation and Personal Days Great Benefits including Medical and Dental Insurance Voluntary Short-Term Disability Insurance 401K Retirement Program with company contribution - FREE MONEY!
